name: ELITHA
description:
Elitha是一名工程师，她负责设计以及修理关卡中的装置

注： 

请原谅难看的美术以及极低的完成度。

原本的计划是玩家可以设计关卡，但时间不够。

游戏中部分素材来自Unity  2DGamekit

-------------------------------------------------

Elitha is a travel engineer who is responsible for designing and repairing the equipment in the level.

“A，D” moves around, “S” crouch, “Space” jumps, “S+Space” goes down the platform.

Note: 

Please forgive the ugly art and the extremely low degree of completion.

The original plan was that players could design levels, but not enough time.

Part of the game's material comes from Unity 2DGamekit
